rules_text:
[b]Cliques are enchantment tokens with the following colors + abilities:[/b]
{W}{U}{B} TIRIL HOST
– {4}: Surveil 2. Activate only as a sorcery.
{U}{B}{R} HAZAKH ARSENAL
– {4}: Create a 2/2 colorless Minion creature token with decayed. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
{B}{R}{G} VISHANKI INC.
– {4}: Create a Treasure token. Activate only as a sorcery.
{R}{G}{W} PENRATH INSURGENCY
– {4}: Up to one target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
{G}{W}{U} SILLAMAN LABORATORIES
– {4}: Tap up to one target untapped creature. You may put a +1/+1 counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.
